articles.author: Shantanu Srivastava
articles.title: Boxing: Olympic-bound Parveen suspended for whereabouts violation - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The 57kg boxer, who had earned a quota for India at the Asian Games, has been provisionally suspended for 18 months
articles.content: In a major jolt to India's medal hopes at the upcoming Paris Games, World Championships bronze medallist Parveen Hooda is all but certain to miss her Olympics quota owing to Whereabout Failure. "Parv… [+2697 chars]
